programme.title: BARS
programme.desc: Kobe lives a picture-perfect life. A devoted wife and mother, she has everything she's ever wanted. But her idyllic world shatters when she's abruptly arrested and sentenced to life in prison for a crime she didn't commit. Desperate for survival, Kobe finds solace and strength in a tight-knit group of inmates known as The Pretty Girls. Unaware of Kobe's ordeal, her twin sister Shaq returns home only to discover the shocking truth.

programme.title: Vampire Genesis
programme.desc: Half-alien Teh'a flees across galaxies, hunted by a race of parasitic rulers disguised as Earth's vampires. With rebels by her side, she seeks a legendary creature: the first vampire, powerful enough to end their reign of terror.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: When known rapper Poetic Rhymes goes to jail, he encounters an unusual cellmate that alters his views on reality. When he is released from prison, his new visions and knowledge begins to affect those he loves the most.

programme.title: Wannabe a Star
programme.desc: Dr. Cool is the new fast talking acting teacher at a local performing arts school, except he’s never taught a class before, let alone an acting class. The classes, administration, and investors soon begin to call him on his bluff, and threaten to unravel his secrets.

programme.title: Liquid Dreams
programme.desc: The Dawkins brothers, navigating new careers and relationships, find their bond tested when a wild night of partying sets off a chain of events. Years after their initial adventures, they face fresh challenges that threaten to tear them apart.

programme.title: Smash and Dash
programme.desc: Clarence, a Chef from Chicago, is very passionate about two things, food and love. After being jilted at the altar, Clarence's friends Lakeith and Buddy, immediately urge him to get back into the dating pool, but under one condition, and that is for him to "Smash and Dash.” Clarence needs to hook up with as many women as he possibly can through a dating app without falling in love.

programme.title: Who's Watching Us
programme.desc: When Ruth is hired to babysit for the Harris family, she and the children find out that someone else is watching them closely. Ruth and Jasmine have to fight to protect themselves and her little brother Micah.

programme.title: Liquid Dreams
programme.desc: The Dawkins brothers, navigating new careers and relationships, find their bond tested when a wild night of partying sets off a chain of events. Years after their initial adventures, they face fresh challenges that threaten to tear them apart.

programme.title: The Undeserving
programme.desc: Harper, a cold-blooded assassin, botches a hit on the wrong target. Hunted by her employer, she's forced to confront her past trauma. Follow her descent into darkness as she tries to survive and escape the consequences of her actions.

programme.title: Toxic King
programme.desc: Keeng is searching for love in all the wrong places. After years of trouble relationships, he decides to just be a playboy and become a “serial love hopper” that is until he reunites with Zuri, a college friend who he has always had a crush on. Will he fight for true love? Or resign to being a Toxic King?

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: A special ops team enters the underground bunker "Hades" to rescue missing scientists, only to uncover a terrifying secret far beyond their expectations.

programme.title: The Price of Fame
programme.desc: In the streets of Atlanta, Cassie, a struggling young woman searching for purpose, meets Ryan, a charismatic interviewer who offers her a chance to step into the world of fame and opportunity. With guidance from her cunning best friend, Ledrick, Cassie navigates the glamorous yet cutthroat entertainment industry. But as hidden agendas and betrayals emerge, Cassie finds herself questioning the cost of her dreams.

programme.title: The Wrong Man
programme.desc: In the wake of a devastating loss, a widowed mother is left to navigate the complexities of life with her two children. She is determined to provide stability and find love again. New love is sometimes not what it seems.

programme.title: Dream on Dreamer 2
programme.desc: Derrick attempts to break it off with his side-chick Keisha, but she thought she was his one and only. That is until she finds out about his fiancé Crystal. To get revenge, Keisha decides to befriend Crystal.

programme.title: Induced
programme.desc: An expectant couple heads to a remote cabin to have a natural childbirth, but comes under attack from a predatory midwife who will stop at nothing to snatch their unborn child from them.
